question:
The Constitution of India gives the people the right to move freely throughout the territory of India and to reside and settle in any part of the territory of India. However, the state can impose
reasonable restrictions on these freedoms for the sake of ___
1.Interest of general public
2.Interest of Scheduled Tribes
3.Sovereignty & integrity of India
4.Commercial Interests of the state
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
